titleStmt.title: A declaration of the General Council of the Officers of the Army: agreed upon at Wallingford-house, 27th Octob. 1659. Thursday, 27th Octob. 1659. Ordered by the General Council of the Officers of the Army, that this declaration be forthwith printed and published. Tho: Sandford Secret.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, printer to the Army, dwelling in Aldersgate Street next door to the Peacock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Aldersgate Street next door to the Peacock
